content.body: Jack Works: I am down a rabbit hole. Not sure if you remember: https://github.com/tc39/proposal-compartments/issues/11 Was your intention there to do a babel-like transform on a Javascript file?
content.formatted_body: Jack Works: I am down a rabbit hole. Not sure if you remember: https://github.com/tc39/proposal-compartments/issues/11 Was your intention there to do a babel-like transform on a Javascript file?

content.body: At a high level do any of these proposals allow one to create an import "preprocessor" that hooks all imports (and their import attributes), modify their source text, and output a module? (And then hook any new imports if applicable in that module recursively). Or is that out of scope for the proposals?
That is certainly within scope for a `Module` instance constructor with an `importHook`.
content.formatted_body: That is certainly within scope for a Module instance constructor with an importHook.
